amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to reversing cuts to the Social Security Administration, which may include cuts ordered by the Department of Government Efficiency or any other cuts to seniors' services.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2186 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 50. Record Vote Number: 180.

action.text: Amendment SA 2186 proposed by Senator Ossoff to Amendment SA 1717.
